name: Panzer! Supporter Edition
description:
PANZER! is an arcade shoote-em-up open source game with tanks, inspired by classic Battle City / Tank 1990 game from NES console.

It offers 20 action-filled levels in which you alone (or with your friend) is all that is standing against divers horde of enemy tanks and your gold start. You need to protect it at all cost!

  • 20 levels
  • 4 types of tanks that players can gain control over through power-up system
  • 6 enemy types
  • single player or co-op for 2 players

This is Supporter Edition for people that want to support { Fun Things Happen } projects. It's exactly the same version as the one available on microstudio.dev.
